reasoning: Primary motility disorder of esophagus with incidence ~1.0 per 100k person-years based on multiple European cohort studies. Chronic condition with clear diagnostic criteria but variable epidemiological documentation.
source: Vaezi MF et al. (2020). The ACG Clinical Guideline: Diagnosis and Management of Achalasia. Am J Gastroenterol. 115(8):1231-1263
